languages.text: All enemies suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All enemies with burning, toxin, or bleeding effects within a 5-cell radius suffer a −10% penalty to dodge tests.

All enemies suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, toxin, or {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} suffer a –30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}.
